description.value:
The touch of undeath runs through your blood. Your family tree might contain powerful undead, like a vampire, or perhaps you died and returned a bit different.

Spell List divine

Bloodline Skills Intimidation, Religion

Granted Spells cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Chill Touch]{Chill Touch}, 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Harm]{Harm}, 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.False Life]{False Life}, 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bind Undead]{Bind Undead}, 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Talking Corpse]{Talking Corpse}, 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Cloudkill]{Cloudkill}, 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Vampiric Exsanguination]{Vampiric Exsanguination}, 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Finger of Death]{Finger of Death}, 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Horrid Wilting]{Horrid Wilting}, 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wail of the Banshee]{Wail of the Banshee}

Bloodline Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Undeath's Blessing]{Undeath's Blessing}, advanced: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Drain Life]{Drain Life}, greater: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Grasping Grave]{Grasping Grave}

Blood Magic Necromantic energy flows through you or one target. Either you gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's level for 1 round, or a target takes 1 negative damage per spell level (if the spell already deals initial negative damage, combine this with the spell's initial damage before determining weaknesses and resistances).
